thread.title: The child refugees beaten by police in eastern Europe
thread.title_full: The child refugees beaten by police in eastern Europe

title: The child refugees beaten by police in eastern Europe
text: Child refugees aged EIGHT mauled by dogs, beaten by police and forced to sleep in squalid warehouses in temperatures of -10C Around 1,600 refugees have been illegally 'pushed back' into Serbia from Croatia and Hungary, it is claimed They are beaten by police, stripped of their clothes then sent back, according to Save The Children charity Some of the 7,000 migrants who arrived in Serbia are now sleeping rough in squalid, abandoned warehouses Here they cook food over burning rubbish and suffer breathing problems due to resulting, hazardous fumes
